column4: video card problem? do you know what video card your system has?
yeah.. 10.04 has some issues with some Intel Integrated gvideo card models. there are some workarounds, list here --> https://wiki.ubuntu.com/LucidLynx/ReleaseNotes#Intel%208xx%20X%20freezes/crashes
you need to install the kernel-headers
just to let you know, the package you probably want is.. linux-headers-generic   ..if you're using the generic kernel
ok I just checked synaptics, and linux-headers-2.6.32-21-generic is installed
should I install the 2.6.32-22-generic version as well?
what do you get from --> uname -r  ?
I get -22 maybe my kernel updated in one of the apt upgrades lol
if your just using kernel 2.6.32-22 then you could just purge the old -21 revision as long as your booted into the -22 version
i don't know anything about wireless, sorry. you use a laptop/netbook? i'm just simple desktop guy here, and i don't even have any bluetooth components or anything
yea I was mostly wondering about the other package that they said to download. There isn't one that's named the same for Lucid
yeah, bot wasn't helpful there. i usually just use apt-cache search in terminal
